sentences.en: Ceiling and wall lights can operate independently.
sentences.cn: 吊灯和壁灯可单独开关。

sentences.en: Cross - overs have occurred independently of each other between pair of homologous chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 交换现象独立地在每一对同源染色体之间发生.

sentences.en: Each firm acts independently; no collusion is present.
sentences.cn: 每个厂商都独立行动; 不存在相互勾结.

sentences.en: He argued that ideas do not exist independently of the language that expresses them.
sentences.cn: 他论证说,思想不会独立存在于用以表达的语言之外.
他靠自己的努力而致富。

sentences.en: In each of these cases, one of the models evolved independently of the other.
sentences.cn: 在这里的每种情况下，其中一个模型独立于另一个模型而发展。

sentences.en: In the realm of truth - processes facts come independently and determine our beliefs provisionally.
sentences.cn: 在真理过程这一领域中,事实独立发生,并且暂时决定我们的信念.

sentences.en: Independently of what you may think, I have my own opinion.
sentences.cn: 不管你怎么想, 我有我自己的意见.

sentences.en: Mayer and Joule independently achieve the great vision.
sentences.cn: 迈耳和焦耳各自独立地得到这一伟大的见解.

sentences.en: Service each copy independently: You can update one copy without affecting any of the other ones.
sentences.cn: 独立维护每个副本： 可以独立更新某一个副本，而不影响其他的副本。

sentences.en: Such a dikaryon cannot apparently exist independently of the haploid phase.
sentences.cn: 这样的双核体显然不能独立于单倍体阶段而存在.

sentences.en: The commission will operate independently of ministers.
sentences.cn: 委员会将独立运作，不受各部部长管辖。

sentences.en: The student should be able to enounce these sounds independently.
sentences.cn: 学生应该自己会发这些音.

sentences.en: The student union is run independently of college authorities.
sentences.cn: 学生会独立于学院当局.

sentences.en: We have two motors, one on each rear wheel, so the control system has to control each motor independently.
sentences.cn: 而且我们有两个，每一个后轮都有一个，说以控制系统必须独立地控制每一个电机。

sentences.en: We must train them to think independently.
sentences.cn: 我们必须训练他们独立思考.

words.tran_cn: 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的
独立；组合教会制；独立国
